title: Print, "Designs for Bronze Ornaments", 1745
medium: Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper
inscribed: On plate, upper center 7me. Livre; upper right: G; upper center, in the image: Livre de Surrurerie. Nouvellement Inventé, par François de Cuvilliés, Conseiller ét Architecte de Sa Majesté Imperialle./Gravé par Charles Albert de Lespilliez; ét se vend chez lauteur; center, in the image: Divers desseins d'ornemens de Bronze, a Lusage/de la ferrure pour les apartemens.; lower center: Se vend aussi a Paris chez le Sr. Poilly ruë St. Iacque a limage St. Benoit Avec Privilege du Roy.; lower center: C.P.S.C.M.; lower right: 1.
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux (D. 80 and 81)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Nine elements, marked A-H, with a key lower left and right. Scale in four pouces.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Designs for Bronze Ornaments", 1745.
1745. Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-285-39.
